trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class provides a hierarchical menu Web server control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>classe fornece um controle de servidor Web do menu hierárquico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação de código-fonte que descreve o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup and added to the existing markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é mantido para marcação e adicionado a marcação existente para a página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The MenuDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe MenuDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controles em um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de esquemas para exibição de formatação de **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os modelos de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MenuDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe MenuDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>método obtém a marcação que processa um espaço reservado para o controle associado em tempo de design quando nenhuma marcação estiver disponível.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>método fornece a marcação que renderiza o controle associado em tempo de design, quando um erro ocorreu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A>método associa associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle à fonte de dados de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>método constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is obtained from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>classe, adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>que é obtido o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>base da propriedade e, em seguida, retorna o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de formatação predefinidas esquemas para exibir o **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from predefined internal constants.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>objeto é preenchido com constantes internas predefinidas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the provider can refresh the schema.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o provedor pode atualizar o esquema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o esquema pode ser atualizado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle associado à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following conditions is true, the DataBind method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> property, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> base method: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is not `null` or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se uma das seguintes condições for verdadeira, o método DataBind limpa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>base método: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade não é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>propriedade não é `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> collection contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>coleção contém um ou mais elementos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia desse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> para associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A> method to bind the design-time data source to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control, and then the GetDesignTimeHtml calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.GetDesignModeState%2A> method to cause the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to generate its static-view and dynamic-view markup.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A>método para associar a fonte de dados de tempo de design associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle e, em seguida, as chamadas GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.GetDesignModeState%2A>método para fazer com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle para gerar sua marcação exibição estática e exibição dinâmica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.GetDesignModeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml returns the markup for the current view.
trans-unit.target: O GetDesignTimeHtml retorna a marcação para o modo de exibição atual.

trans-unit.source: If the current view is not defined, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: Se o modo de exibição atual não for definido, o GetDesignTimeHtml chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método de base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que processa um espaço reservado para o controle associado em tempo de design quando nenhuma marcação estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method generates the markup for a placeholder that specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control name and a message instructing you to use the collection editor to add items.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml gera a marcação para um espaço reservado que especifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controlar o nome e uma mensagem solicitando que você usar o editor de coleção para adicionar itens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto de marcação que renderiza a um espaço reservado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a marcação que renderiza o controle associado em tempo de design quando ocorreu um erro.

trans-unit.source: The GetErrorDesignTimeHtml method generates markup that renders the error design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and messages describing the error.
trans-unit.target: O método GetErrorDesignTimeHtml gera marcação que renderiza o tempo de design do erro <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo, o nome do controle e mensagens que descreve o erro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> object that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>objeto que foi gerado.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> at design time after an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> em tempo de design depois que um erro ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source to use at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo para usar em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The sample data source that is constructed by the GetSampleDataSource method has several root menu items with empty paths.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados de exemplo que é criada pelo método GetSampleDataSource tem vários itens de menu raiz com caminhos vazios.

trans-unit.source: This sample data source is used at design time if no menu items are defined for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control and if the menu cannot be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Esta fonte de dados de exemplo é usado em tempo de design se não há itens de menu são definidos para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle e se o menu não pode ser associado a uma fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> to use as a data source for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> para usar como uma fonte de dados para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer visual chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia desse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>, which implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref>, que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: *component* is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> or of a class derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: *componente* não é um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> ou de uma classe derivada de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema of the data source view for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema da exibição da fonte de dados associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method will be called by the design host only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true.
trans-unit.target: O método RefreshSchema será chamado por if design host somente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>propriedade é true.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, exibir mensagens de erro quando ocorrerem exceções durante o processamento; caso contrário, as mensagens de exceção são exibidas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um esquema que descreve a exibição da fonte de dados associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref> object that describes the structure of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref> objeto que descreve a estrutura da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the provider can refresh the schema.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o provedor pode atualizar o esquema.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o esquema pode ser atualizado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that error messages should not be displayed when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que as mensagens de erro não devem ser exibidas quando ocorrerem exceções durante o processamento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current schema object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de esquema atual para o designer.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The current schema object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de esquema atual para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os modelos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property gets a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> base property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade obtém TemplateGroups um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>base propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: It then adds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object named "`ItemTemplates`" that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> objects named "StaticItemTemplate" and "DynamicItemTemplate".
trans-unit.target: Ele adiciona ao <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objeto denominado "`ItemTemplates`" que contém duas <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>objetos denominados "StaticItemTemplate" e "DynamicItemTemplate".</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property returns this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> to the caller.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups retorna isso <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>ao chamador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each template in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada modelo no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a copy of the associated control or use the control itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia do controle associado ou use o controle em si para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle não afeta qualquer persistência para os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> object itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control are persisted to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usa associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>próprio para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações de tempo de design para o controle de objeto são mantidas para a origem de marcação da página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
